price: 150. Mayee! Alle baa ah Gargaarihiin, Isagaana u wanaagsan gargaarayaasha.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
